tool_description: Explore best cities to live for digital nomads! Sort by internet speed, cost of living and more! Filter by continents
name: Nomadlist Digital nomad travel API
title: Nomadlist Digital nomad travel API

api_list.name: City
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nomadlist-digital-nomad-travel-api.p.rapidapi.com/cities/lausanne"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nomadlist-digital-nomad-travel-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://nomadlist-digital-nomad-travel-api.p.rapidapi.com/cities/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nomadlist-digital-nomad-travel-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Cities

optional_parameters.name: orderBy
optional_parameters.description: use any key from response like rank, cost_score, cost_for_nomad_in_usd, etc..

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: how many records you need. Max 25
